name: Planet C0lonizer
description:
Made for https://itch.io/jam/wowie-jam-4 WARNING: After pressing 'play' the game will lag a bit, please don't panic.

You are tasked with colonizing an alien planet. You can only use AI rovers to do so (you have to write the AI yourself). The inhabitants of this world might not take kindly to your presence. Good luck!

Music/sound effects taken from: https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/wowie-pack

A little more about the game:
- You have to write your own AI for the rovers (and cooperate with them)
- Your rovers can mine ore
- There are 3 types of ore: iron, copper and gold (look around the map for a bit to find them. Gold can only be found in the corners of the map. TIP: there is some iron to the right of your Hub and some copper south-east)
- Ore can be used for making more rovers/building turrets/buy upgrades
- Rovers first have to deposit the ore to the Hub before it can be used (look in the 'help' section in the code editor to learn more)
- In the corners of the map are alien hives
- Aliens will attack you every so often
- Military rovers can't dig, but can fight the aliens
- Turrets and military rovers attack automatically - If your Hub is destroyed, you lose
